content: this is a men s cardigan knit in cascade yarns ecological wool using stranded color work it s worked all in 1x1 rib and has a zipper closure and a short row shawl collar i also offer dude-inspired patterns that are worked in the round in plain stockinette stitch in unisex adult sizes the knitter s dude /patterns/library/the-knitters-dude and in baby and kids sizes the little dude /patterns/library/the-little-dude they can be purchased separately or together in the ebook the royal we /patterns/sources/the-royal-we like my designs subscribe to my weekly newsletter 1 to get updates exclusive sales and recommendations **sizes and finished measurements** sizes s m l 1x 2x chest circumference 36 38 42 46 50 in/91 5 96 5 106 75 116 75 127 cm **yarn** main color 1435 yd/1312 m bulky weight yarn contrast color 1 478 yd/437 m bulky weight yarn contrast color 2 478 yd/ 437 m bulky weight yarn shown in cascade yarns ecological wool 100% wool 478 yd/437 m per 250g skein main color vanilla #8014 3 3 3 4 4 skeins contrast color 1 latte #8063 1 skein contrast color 2 ebony #8095 1 skein **blocked gauge** 21 sts/21 row = 4in/10 cm in un-stretched 1x1 rib on us #10/6 mm needle **needles and notions** needle sizes are recommendations only always use needle size necessary to obtain gauge us #10/6 00 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle us#6/4 00 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle us #4/3 55 mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle us #11/8 00mm 24-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle optional to maintain gauge over color charts circular needles are recommended because the project is quite heavy and circular needles will support this weight more effectively share your incredible dude achievements on the dude kal 2 forum thread 1 https //www andrearangel com/newsletter 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/andrea-rangel-knits/1665539/1-25#7
